subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Security and Warning Systems
Football
organizations: New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority
lead_paragraph: The scene at Gate D was markedly different Sunday than during halftime of last week’s Jets’ game, when several hundred men cheered for women in the crowd to bare their breasts.
snippet: The scene at Gate D was markedly different Sunday than during halftime of last week’s Jets’ game, when several hundred men cheered for women in the crowd to bare their breasts.
